ch.ethz.csb.youscope.server.addon.job
Interface JobConstructionAddon

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChangePositionJobConstructionAddon, ComposedImagingJobConstructionAddon, CompositeJobConstructionAddon, DeviceJobConstructionAddon, FocusingJobConstructionAddon, ImagingJobConstructionAddon, MultiPositionJobConstructionAddon, OscillatingDeviceJobConstructionAddon, OutOfFocusJobConstructionAddon, ParallelImagingJobConstructionAddon, ScriptingJobConstructionAddon, StatisticsJobConstructionAddon, WaitForUserJobConstructionAddon, ZSlidesJobJobConstructionAddon

Author:
langmo

Method Summary
 ElementaryJob createJob(JobConfigurationDTO jobConfiguration, JobInitializer initializer, Well well, int[] positionInformation)

Method Detail

createJob

ElementaryJob createJob(JobConfigurationDTO jobConfiguration,
                        JobInitializer initializer,
                        Well well,
                        int[] positionInformation)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                               ConfigurationException,
                               JobCreationException
Called when this addon should initialize the job (and possibly all of its sub-jobs)according to the configuration.

Parameters:
jobConfiguration - The configuration of this job.
initializer - An interface providing information about the environment in which the job is initialized, and allowing to initialize sub-jobs or even whole measurements.
well - The well in which the job gets initialized, or null if this job will not belong to a well measurement.
positionInformation - The position information with which the job should be initialized.
Returns:
The newly created job.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
ConfigurationException
JobCreationException
